titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: We returned to the Deanery after breakfast in the Bishop's car. I wrote a little sermon for the troops. After lunch I walked with Logic, and attended Evensong. I wrote to Reggie Woodyear. Also I wrote 'Christmas letters' to Mary Radford and Arthur. I sent £5 to the Mayor for the Belgian Refugees.
